eu.geclipse.ui.internal
Class GridConnectionFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ViewerFilter
      eu.geclipse.ui.internal.GridConnectionFilter

public class GridConnectionFilter
extends org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ViewerFilter

Implementation of a ViewerFilter that may be used in conjunction with viewers used to display Grid model elements. This filter allows to set file extensions to be filtered. It is possible to define multiple file extensions but only one of these extensions will be active and will be used for filtering. The filter can be linked to a combo box that will be used to display the list of available filters and to select the currently active filter. Note that file extensions have to be specified WITHOUT their leading period.

Method Detail

addFileExtensionFilter

public void addFileExtensionFilter(java.lang.String filter)
Add the specified file extension to the list of the available filters. If not active filter is yet defined this file extension will be set as the currently active filter.

Parameters:
filter - A new file extention filter. This has to be a string containing the file extension WIHTOUT the leading period.

clearFileExtensionFilters

public void clearFileExtensionFilters()
Clear the list of currently available filters.

link

public void link(org.eclipse.jface.viewers.StructuredViewer viewer,
                 org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Combo combo)
Link the specified StructuredViewer and Combo with this filter. The Combo is used to display the list of all available filters and to specified the currently active filter. The viewer will be updated whenever a new active filter is selected. Note that changes in the available filters are not forwarded to the linked components. So make sure to set up all filters before linking any components.

Parameters:
viewer - The StructuredViewer to be linked to this GridConnectionFilter.
combo - The Combo to be linked to this GridConnectionFilter.

setActiveFilter

public void setActiveFilter(java.lang.String filter)
Set the currently active filter, i.e. the filter that will be applied to any associated StructuredViewer. If the specified filter is not yet contained in the list of available filters it will be added before setting it to be the active one.

Parameters:
filter - The new currently active filter.

setFileExtensionFilter

public void setFileExtensionFilter(java.lang.String filter)
Clear the list of currently available filters and set the specified filter as the only available filter and therefore also as the currently active filter.

Parameters:
filter - The filter to be set.

select
